titleStmt.title: Londinopolis, an historicall discourse or perlustration of the city of London, the imperial chamber, and chief emporium of Great Britain whereunto is added another of the city of Westminster, with the courts of justice, antiquities, and new buildings thereunto belonging / by Jam Howel, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.
Stow, John, 1525?-1605. Survey of London.

biblFull.extent: [12], 124, 301-407, [9] p., [1] folded leaf of plates : ill., port.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Streater for Henry Twiford, George Sawbridge, Th and John Place, and are to be sold at their shops,

notesStmt.note: Paging irregular: "The seeming error may perhaps be attributed to the book being printed at different offices"--Upcott.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
